Trade/Device Name(s): SuperCheck Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System (Model 5228-S)
SuperCheck Plus Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System (Model 5228-M)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): SuperCheck Plus Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SuperCheck Plus blood glucose monitoring systems for quantitative measurement of blood glucose in whole blood specimens
Indications for Use Summary: For self-testing or professional use as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control programs, measuring glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip or forearm (Model 5228-S for single-user home testing, Model 5228-M for multiple-patient use in healthcare settings; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use)
